sn55.28:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.28:1.3: “yato kho, gahapati, ariyasavakassa panca bhayani verani vupasantani ca honti, catuhi ca sotapattiyangehi samannagato hoti, ariyo cassa nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho, so akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
sn55.28:1.4: ‘khinanirayomhi khinatiracchanayoni khinapettivisayo khinapayaduggativinipato; sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’.
sn55.28:2.1: Katamani panca bhayani verani vupasantani honti?
sn55.28:2.2: Yam, gahapati, panatipati panatipatappaccaya ditthadhammikampi bhayam veram pasavati, samparayikampi bhayam veram pasavati, cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvediyati.
sn55.28:2.3: Panatipata pativiratassa evam tam bhayam veram vupasantam hoti.
sn55.28:2.7: yam, gahapati, suramerayamajjappamadatthayi suramerayamajjappamadatthanappaccaya ditthadhammikampi bhayam veram pasavati, samparayikampi bhayam veram pasavati, cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvediyati.
sn55.28:2.8: Suramerayamajjappamadatthana pativiratassa evam tam bhayam veram vupasantam hoti.
sn55.28:2.9: Imani panca bhayani verani vupasantani honti.
sn55.28:3.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.28:3.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.28:3.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.28:4.1: Katamo cassa ariyo nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho?
sn55.28:4.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasavako paticcasamuppadanneva sadhukam yoniso manasi karoti—
sn55.28:4.3: iti imasmim sati idam hoti, imassuppada idam uppajjati;
sn55.28:4.4: iti imasmim asati idam na hoti, imassa nirodha idam nirujjhati;
sn55.28:4.9: Ayamassa ariyo nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho.
sn55.28:5.1: Yato kho, gahapati, ariyasavakassa imani panca bhayani verani vupasantani honti, imehi catuhi sotapattiyangehi samannagato hoti, ayancassa ariyo nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho. So akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
sn55.28:5.2: ‘khinanirayomhi khinatiracchanayoni khinapettivisayo khinapayaduggativinipato; sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’”ti.
